rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming area with a large open space and natural light. Traditional Kerala-style wooden door, stone flooring.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living area adjoining the kitchen, featuring large windows for cross ventilation and ample daylight. Decorative Kerala motifs on walls.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Integrated with the living room space; equipped with modern amenities but designed in a traditional style with stone countertops and wood accents.

rooms.name: Guest Toilet
rooms.description: Small guest bathroom near the entrance. Traditional Kerala fixtures are incorporated.

rooms.name: Porch/Verandah
rooms.description: Spacious porch area that provides a transitional zone to the interior, offering seating and storage space.

openings.description: Traditional Kerala-style wooden door with carved motifs, ensuring proper Vastu alignment.
Large window facilitating cross ventilation and natural light in the living area.
Large window for the kitchen ensuring ample daylight.
Spacious balcony attached to the master bedroom, designed with traditional Kerala elements.

garden.description: Large garden space in the front and rear of the house, featuring a mix of native plants, water features, and seating areas. The design respects local building norms and provides a serene environment.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an attached balcony providing morning light and Vastu-compliant eastern exposure.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom designed for privacy and comfort with a balcony on the south side for optimal sunlight.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Primary bathroom adjoining the master bedroom, featuring traditional Kerala-style fixtures and tiled floors.

openings.description: Well-ventilated balcony ensuring morning sunlight in the master bedroom.
Additional window for cross ventilation and natural light in secondary bedroom.

rooms.name: Study/Library
rooms.description: Dedicated study space with ample lighting and traditional Kerala aesthetic.

rooms.name: Additional Storage/Utility Room
rooms.description: Storage space for household items and utilities, designed to maintain the overall flow of the townhouse.

openings.description: Window ensuring adequate daylight in study space.
